title: Add Two Numbers
description: A Problem to accept two numbers and calculate its sum
constraints: Inputs a and b are integers such that -1000 ≤ a, b ≤ 1000

codeSnippets.PYTHON:
def add_two_numbers(a, b):
    # Write your code here
    # Return the sum of a and b
    return a + b

import sys
input_line = sys.stdin.read()
a, b = map(int, input_line.split())
print(add_two_numbers(a, b))

referenceSolutions.PYTHON:
import sys
input_line = sys.stdin.read()
a, b = map(int, input_line.split())
# Print the sum of a and b
print(a + b)
